title: Is spraying perfume in a dream good news?

preview.html: Spraying perfume in a dream is good news. Seeing spraying perfume is considered one of the good visions that have gained great acceptance from jurists. Perfume indicates piety, knowledge, increase in the world, good reputation, speech, and work. All the details and clues with more interpretations. Spraying perfume in a dream is good news. Seeing perfume expresses good reputation, union of hearts, monotheism, strength of faith, good deeds, volunteering for good, winning hearts with good words, and spraying perfume is evidence of purity, purity, and chastity. Spraying for the dead indicates the near future and a good ending. If the woman is perfumed, this is evidence of the experience that she benefits from, and starting good deeds and sprinkling perfume on the immoral and immoral people is evidence of self-repentance. And whoever sees that he is spraying perfume on the streets spreads love and peace to people and aspires to spread sweet words. As for spraying perfume excessively, it symbolizes excessive praise and praise. Whoever sees that he is spraying perfume on others, he will appreciate and praise him, but if he hates perfume and does not like Spraying it, this indicates the difficulty of adapting or aversion to normal work. Spraying perfume in a dream is good news for Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that perfumes indicate praise, flattery, good conduct, great benefits, following the correct instinct, abandoning falsehood and opposite desires, and adopting the correct approach. And sitting with righteous people and benefiting from them. Whoever sees that he is spraying perfume, this indicates goodness, nourishment, success, advancing one’s opinion, blessing, entering into fruitful partnerships, good characteristics, noble morals, achieving goals and achieving goals. Seeing spraying perfume is good news for the death of heartache, the end of long-term disputes and disagreements, and the achievement of goals. Acceptance and love, contentment and harmony between disputants, resolving outstanding issues, and dissolving sorrows. . And fears. If a person sprays perfume and it smells bad or bad, this indicates his lack of appreciation and lack of appreciation. Spraying perfume in a dream is good news for single women. Perfume for women in general, and single women in particular, is interpreted in two ways, either deception or truth, or seduction or guidance. Or integrity or loss. Spraying perfume on an unmarried woman is linked to the one for whom he sprays it, and if he is one of her mahrams, then it is good in her circumstances, increase in her worldly life, and abundance in her life. And if he sees someone sprinkling perfume on her, then he will tempt her in her religious and worldly affairs, and if he refrains Regarding the sprayer, he rejects the methods of seduction and temptation. Buying a perfume is a sign of purity, concealment, and protection from temptation and doubt, and choosing a specific perfume indicates its characteristics or quality. Spraying perfume in a dream is good news for a married woman. Spraying perfume symbolizes the best of circumstances, the union of hearts, and the improvement of living conditions. Especially if spraying perfume for the husband or incest. Excessive spraying of perfume indicates increased self-care and attention to personal hygiene, and if she sees a strange man spraying her with perfume, he misleads her and leads her away from the truth. If you see a woman spraying herself with perfume, this is a woman inciting him or tempting him to do falsehood, and the abundance of perfume is evidence. For her grace

title: Seeing dead people uncomfortable in a dream

preview.html: As for the reasons for his coming in a dream in this case, we will learn this with you in the following lines through our translator, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a dead person in a dream for an unmarried woman shows many different signs. This depends on his relationship with the dead person, and the situation in which he appeared. The dead person, and the conversation that took place between them. Whoever saw her dead father in a dream hugging her tightly or hugging him. She misses him a lot and always remembers him and asks for his mercy and forgiveness. And everyone who sees her dead gets something in the dream such as money, food, or clothes. It is an unpleasant vision that portends loss and the loss of things. Precious in her life. And whoever sees a living person dying in a dream, God will alleviate his worries and grant him health. Blessing in life and sustenance, and that is if the servant knows her. Or she sees in a dream a stranger dying in front of her. She is suffering from many things in her life and her psychological state is getting worse. And God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for food. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a dead mother in a dream indicates that she is silent and does not seem strange to her. To the dreamer who feels homesick for her and needs her very much. And whoever sees her dead husband looking To her in a dream, he may become ill for a while. It was also said: She must reconsider her actions and not sever ties with the dead person’s family. If a married woman sees a dead person whom she knows as one of her relatives, she will sleep with him in a dream. It is an indication that the dreamer will receive a great inheritance and benefit from the deceased. When a married woman sees a dead person crying in a dream. If she is unknown to her, the dream heralds comfort and recovery if she is sick. Or if she knows the dead person and she appears in a dream crying. He may be sad about the condition of the living and may need to pray and seek forgiveness. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream About the man and its meaning When a man sees in a dream one of his deceased relatives, he smiles at him in the dream. It is a good vision that carries good omens for the Lord, but also for the dead. This vision expresses a good ending for the deceased, and a feeling of comfort in his place. As for the dreamer, the vision is good, and many blessings if God willing. Seeing a dead person sick in a dream is evidence of his suffering in his grave because of something. He may be in debt or was guilty in his life, and God knows best. Whoever kisses a dead person whom he knows in a dream will receive his money from inheritance or benefit from his dead descendants, and God knows best. Read also: Shaking hands and kissing the dead in a dream. The meaning of seeing a dead woman in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. It is said that seeing a pregnant woman dead in her dream is one of the visions related to her psychological state. Her feeling of fear for her fetus and her anxiety as her due date approaches. If the pregnant woman sees that the dead person is giving her water in a dream, she must take care of her health and stay away. About popular recipes and contact the doctor if you feel any problem. Seeing a dead person giving her something in a dream, such as food or clothes. It is a praiseworthy vision, and it expresses the abundance of livelihood and protection in this world and the afterlife. In the event that the deceased gives a pregnant woman a gold ring or an earring in a dream. It is news of the boy's birth, however

title: Interpretation of seeing black cats in a dream

preview.html: Seeing black cats in a dream Whoever dreams of a black cat attacking him in a dream, this indicates that there is an enemy near him who is trying to seize your money. Whoever sees in a dream a black cat attacking him in a dream and scratching this dream indicates illness. And whoever hears? The sound of a cat bowl in a dream, this indicates that there is a friend near the owner of the dream who is characterized by cunning and deceit. Whoever kills a black cat in a dream, this indicates getting rid of worries, sorrows and problems and improving the situation for the better. Whoever sees in a dream a black cat heading towards him, this indicates good luck that will come to the owner of the dream. As for whoever sees the black cat walking in the opposite direction, this indicates a lack of livelihood and bad luck. Seeing a black cat in a single dream An unmarried woman who sees a black cat in a dream, this is the person who approaches her with deception and cunning, and takes love as a mistake. Interpretation of seeing a married black cat A married woman sees a black cat in a dream, this dream indicates failure in a romantic relationship. Interpretation of seeing a black cat for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees a black cat in a dream indicates that the newborn is a male, and God knows best. In general, seeing a black cat in a dream, this dream is An omen of bad luck for the dreamer and indicates the proximity of a cunning and deceitful friend. Interpretation of a dream about a black cat Scholars interpreted seeing a black cat in a dream as an indication of the dreamer's psychological state, lack of self-confidence, and the fear that resides within him. Whoever sees in a dream that a black cat is attacking you in a dream, this indicates the time and that it is time for you to go, even without your will. Whoever sees in a dream the cat's tail in a dream, this indicates that he is a lucky lover. If you see a black cat in a dream, this may indicate sad things that happen to the dreamer, or regretting things that will happen in the future. Interpretation of seeing a black cat by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets that he sees a black cat in a dream attacking him, but he succeeded in going through crises, but he can solve them and overcome them, and if he is sick, this is a sign of recovery, and the dream can be. A sign of getting a new job. And the sound of a cat and its screaming in a dream is a treacherous friend trying to harm you. Therefore, we have provided you with all the possible interpretations of seeing a black cat in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about guessing in a dream and its meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about speculation In a dream, speculation is a kind of energy discharge within a person or a way to get rid of anger or hatred towards someone, and it can also be a way to express objection to something that a person does by hitting. Not like, and on the other hand it is possible that it is a method of self-defense, but seeing guessing in a dream has signs and signals for the person who sees it, so what are the signs that indicate that the interpretation of speculation in the dream indicates in. Interpretation of dreams SpeculationWith someone I knowGuessing is something bad in real life, Because it is the result of anger, hatred, or annoyance at the person who hits the other, interpretation of the dream of speculation with someone I know. If a married woman sees that she is speculating with her partner in her dream, there will be disagreements between them, but they will not last long and will end. While speculation with the mother in the dream symbolizes A harbinger of something bad between the mother and the fortuneteller, such as quarrels and disagreements between them. On the other hand, it is a harbinger of his mother’s anger towards him, beyond the necessity of trying to gain her approval to make his life happy. Also, seeing a conflict with a partner in a dream symbolizes a conflict between him and one of the partners because of a strange external person Also, this quarrel will not continue and will change to something better than before, that is, they will settle down and the relationship will return to what it was and better. And if the person with whom the speculation occurred in the dream is someone with whom he has a real conflict, then it is the result of the fortuneteller’s opinion. In the same context, it is An indication of what this person wants to overcome and regain his rights from this oppressor. However, if one of the husband or wife’s parents sees them as contradictory in his dream, this is a sign of the calm and stability that the dreamer enjoys. It also symbolizes the happy and stable married life of this couple. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a blow to the stomach in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of dreams Speculation with an unknown personDreams can be experienced by people we have not seen before, and this vision has a different interpretation of what could happen if they were people known to us, such as: Interpretation of a dream of guessing with an unknown person. Seeing people that the sleeper does not know They argue with him in his dream indicates the evil that befalls him in secret from his acquaintances and he must be careful. Whereas, if a woman is married and sees that she is in a conflict with a woman she does not know, this is a symbol of the presence of a person who constantly causes conflicts with her partner. In short, this dream shows the presence of bad people Those around him who are jealous of the good things he has in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone getting hit on the cheek in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about brothers’ speculation. It is normal to see speculation between brothers in life that happened in their childhood, but in the dream what does it indicate? So what is the interpretation? A dream of speculation for brothers. If the sleeper sees that he is involved in speculation with one of his brothers in his house, this is a harbinger of something bad that will happen to this brother that will affect his future. While if the sleeper sees that she is in conflict with her sister, this is evidence that the dreamer has gone through difficulties in her life because of what he saw In the dream. But if he saw her with his brother on another person in H

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing someone you hate in a dream

preview.html: Seeing someone you hate in a dream Seeing someone you hate in your dreams is not considered one of the beautiful things that can make you feel psychologically comfortable and reassured. On the contrary, these dreams can cause insomnia and a lot of anxiety in daily life, but their interpretation has many different considerations that depend on the condition of the viewer, his relationship with this person, and the details of the vision. What is the interpretation of seeing a person you hate in a dream? Many interpreters say that the interpretation Dreams of someone you hate appearing during sleep, and this person is hated in real everyday life. This indicates what his heart hides of hatred and intense hatred for you in reality, and you should not be safe from his cunning and treachery. If the person you saw was unknown to you and you did not recognize him and you saw him in a bad way and you do not like him, this means that you do not treat others well and this One of the things that you should try to change. In case you cannot meet the person you hate in your dream and you feel hatred towards him in the dream, this may indicate that you are following one of the uneven paths and forbidden or bad roads and the vision is a warning to you in case you are. You want to continue on your wrong path or continue on it forever. From time to time, it appears that its owner has a lot of people around him who do not love him and are waiting for the right opportunity in which they can lead him to misfortunes and intrigues that harm and harm him. In general, it portends the approach of some worries that may It causes you sadness and pain in your life, as well as the evil expected from others, which you must be aware of because it will affect all the days of your personal and family life later. The appearance of a person who hates you in your dreams can have meaning and vice versa. It can contain both good and evil at the same time, and the bad one can predict a loss that will happen to you in some money, and this depends on how much hatred this person has for you. The next life is an abundant approach to goodness in everything you do in your daily life. Interpretation of dreams about someone you hate by Ibn SirinThe translator Ibn Sirin explained some simple and common cases in which people we hate may be present in our dreams and explained these cases as follows: The appearance of this person can indicate It clearly indicates to a large extent the state of tremendous loss that the dreamer may suffer and that what he will lose a lot of money will not be able to regain again at any time and will greatly affect everyone in the days of his life. If the person who saw the sleeper cannot recognize him or see him clearly , but he does not know who he is, it may mean that he will have a lot of goodness in his life and that the coming days will enjoy happy moments and a great position among men. Interpretation of dreams about a person you hate by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of seeing a person you hate in a dream by Al-Nabulsi? Imam Al-Nabulsi explained that if The person we hate appeared during sleep. This vision could mean the presence of hatred that controls many people and because of it they are trying to harm us greatly. It may

title: Interpretation of the pronunciation of the Shahada in a dream by Al-Osaimi

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you what is the interpretation of pronouncing the shahada in a dream for an unmarried girl and a married woman. He is the Messenger of God), and if the servant says it with his tongue and believes it in his heart, then he has converted to Islam and believed in God Almighty. The sleeper may see in his dream that he is uttering it, and when he wakes up he is confused about the interpretation of this vision, so he wants to know its meaning and what it indicates, and for this reason we will explain to you through the following paragraphs of the encyclopedia the interpretation of this dream according to what Dr. said. Fahd Al-Osaimi said, so follow us. Interpretation of pronouncing the Shahada in a dream Al-OsaimiThe dream doctor and dream interpreter Fahd Al-Osaimi says that pronouncing the Shahada in a dream indicates a human enemy who is absent from the dreamer, and this vision can indicate the end of disputes and the coming of peace. If the woman is divorced and sees in a dream that she She pronounces the shahada, then this is a sign that she will return to her husband. Seeing the shahada being pronounced in a dream may indicate repairing the dreamer’s relationship with the people around him. And if the dreamer commits sins and disobedience, and sees in his dream that he is pronouncing the torment, then this is a praiseworthy vision that promises him repentance in the near future. And that God will accept his repentance and forgive him. And if the dreamer works in trade, and sees in a dream that he bears witness, then this is a dream that promises him to obtain a lot of money from his trade. Seeing the pronouncement of the testimony in a dream brings to the pioneer good news of recovery if he is suffering from an illness. If the owner Dreaming of a student and seeing in the dream that he is pronouncing the Sahadah, then this is evidence of his excellence in his studies and that he will obtain the highest grades. If the dreamer is suffering from the accumulation of debts, and sees in his dream that he is talking about torture, then Doctor Fahd Al-Usaimi says that this dream indicates the repayment of all debts. His debts. Interpretation of a dream of pronouncing a Shahada in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is saying the Shahada, this is a sign that she will hear happy news that will bring joy to her heart. Seeing the pronouncing of the Shahada in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she will soon marry a good young man. morals and religion, and you will fear God in dealing with them and live a happy life with Him. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is teaching someone else torture, then this is a good vision that promises her an escape from all evil, and this dream also shows a great diet and a lot of good that the unmarried girl will do The married woman. May she take it and may God bless her livelihood. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is pronouncing the Shahada and there is someone repeating it behind her, this is a sign of the strength of faith and that this girl is seeking to acquire the sciences of religion and jurisprudence. Interpretation of seeing speaking the Shahada in a dream for a married woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that if A married woman sees in her dream that she is pronouncing the shahada, then this is an indication that she will soon become pregnant. Also, pronouncing the shahada in a married woman’s dream indicates an understanding between her and her husband and that her life is full of happiness and love. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is pronouncing the sahadah and the dying woman, then this is a vision. Mahmouda promises her happiness and prosperity. This vision also shows that the dreamer is...

title: Interpretation of a dream about wet tahini

preview.html: Tahini is a food prepared from sesame seeds and served as an appetizer alongside many other meals. It is distinguished by its delicious taste and many medicinal benefits. You may also be interested in knowing about the river in the dream. The dream shows many images of goodness and food, but their meanings differ from one person to another, and this we will learn through today’s article about the interpretation of seeing liquid tahini in a dream for a single, married, and pregnant man. Seeing tahini in a dream If one sees tahini in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer will receive Satisfaction and blessings. Seeing tahini in a dream for a young man. It can be explained that if a young man dreams that he produces tahini in a large factory. Seeing liquid tahini in a dream for a man. A dream about a man eating a lot of tahini indicates that he will get a lot of money and food in life. Read also: Toilet in a dream, interpretation Seeing liquid tahini in a dream for a man. Interpretation of seeing liquid tahini in a dream. Interpretation of seeing liquid tahini in a dream carries within it many indications of goodness, success, survival, and good offspring. Below we present to you the interpretation of seeing it in a man’s dream. Seeing liquid tahini in a man’s dream symbolizes abundance in the diet. And a lot of money will come to him soon, and success and success in his life, and the blessing of children and family members, and God knows best. The vision of buying tahini from someone indicates that the dreamer will cooperate with this person in a trade and earn a lot of money from it. As for whoever sees himself giving tahini to a woman, he is waiting for That the priest will marry her, and that their family life will be calm and stable, and God knows best. Also, seeing tahini in a man’s dream sometimes indicates good company and abundant goodness that befalls the dreamer. As for whoever sees himself eating tahini, this may indicate that he will find a new job, and as for seeing making Tahini symbolizes stability and reassurance in life and great strength that descends upon the dreamer and upon God. . He knows better. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing liquid tahini in a single woman’s dream. Seeing making tahini and packaging it in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes the problems and difficulties that the girl will face in her life, but she will quickly overcome them with God’s help, and God knows best. On the other hand, seeing Tahini in a dream symbolizes success in achieving one’s goals and achieving what one aspires to. Most of the interpretations of seeing tahini in a person’s dream have positive meanings and good connotations such as nutrition, psychological comfort, success, blessing, and other images of goodness, and God knows best. Read also: Penguin in a dream Interpretation of seeing liquid tahini in A dream for a married woman: The vision of a mother preparing tahini for children indicates the goodness of children, the gospel of success and excellence in life, and the Lord’s care for them from all harm. As for the vision of buying tahini in a married woman’s dream, it indicates getting rid of problems and crises, removing worry and sadness, and the disappearance of sadness after a long period of suffering. If a married woman sees in a dream someone giving her tahini, this is evidence of many goodness and blessings

title: Interpretation of a dream about putting on and taking off clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream dress and taking off clothes in a dream is one of the visions that have multiple interpretations because there are different scenes for dreams of taking off or wearing clothes, such as seeing silk clothes in a dream and the interpretation of this vision. It differs from one person to another, as the vision of a man wearing or taking off clothes differs from the vision of a married or unmarried woman. It applies to any vision of any person, because the interpretation of the vision must be shortened by identifying the interpreter in a set of details surrounding the dreamer so that he can determine the correct interpretation that he sees. Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes in a dream It can indicate the imminent date of his pilgrimage to the Sacred House of God or The completion of Umrah is near. Interpretation of someone taking off his clothes in the public street. This vision may indicate the presence of problems that will stand in the dreamer’s way. Interpretation of a dream about a naked person in a dream is evidence that something happened that made him organize his life for a new beginning and a new opportunity at all levels. Interpretation of a dream that a person is half naked in The interpretation of this matter is that he will suffer from legal injustice, but he will overcome it. Interpretation of a dream about putting on and taking off his clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing Ibn Sirin stripping off his clothes in a dream indicates the dreamer’s weak character with others or that the dreamer is suffering from a serious psychological crisis. Also, taking off clothes in a dream indicates that he will suffer from legal injustice, but he will overcome it. The dream is one of the visions that indicate the dreamer’s feeling of loss of personality among people or a feeling of extreme fear and anxiety. In addition, seeing a dress in a dream is one of the visions that could be a sign of revealing the dreamer’s secrets in front of people. Interpretation of a dream about wearing and taking off clothes in a dream It indicates that taking off clothes expresses the presence of enemies in the life of the world, while wearing clothes may indicate the presence of many friends. Seeing silk clothes in a dream Interpretation of dreams: Putting on and taking off clothes in a dream, and the clothes are made of silk that the dreamer is wearing, this indicates the sustenance and goodness that he will obtain The dreamer. Seeing clothes in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman dreams of wearing long clothes, this vision expresses the covering and goodness that the woman enjoys and the stable life she lives. But if the married woman sees her clothes being removed and her body exposed, then this vision indicates endless marital strife. Also, if a married woman sees her husband wearing her loose, loose clothes in a dream, this indicates mutual love between husband and wife. Seeing clothes in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about putting on and taking off clothes in a dream varies depending on the dream. As for seeing an unmarried woman in a dream wearing clothes Clean white, this indicates the happiness and kindness that she enjoys in her life. Also, if an unmarried girl dreams that one of the young men she knows is wearing new clothes for her, then this vision indicates that this young man wants to propose to her. Seeing the sick person naked in a dream If the sick person dreams that he is taking off His clothes, it means that his death is near. As for being naked in front of people in a dream, this indicates the imminent collapse of anxiety and deception.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing suitable clothes in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing suitable clothes in a dream or dreams by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or the real Imam via the vision website Roy2a.com. A dream about fitting clothes is a recurring dream and seeing suitable clothes. Clothes in a dream may indicate goodness, or they may be a harbinger or warning of the emergence of evil, and interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of wearing clothes, whether it is for a single woman, a married woman, or a pregnant woman. A woman or a divorced woman with various meanings today, through the vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing the fitting of clothes in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, or Al-Nabulsi. Umm Imam al-Sadiq, so they came to us. What is the interpretation of seeing well-fitting clothes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing well-fitting clothes in a dream is a sign of the steadfastness, patience, and effort of the visionary in overcoming crises. Dreaming of wearing white clothes is evidence of the piety of God, the justice of the dreamer, and his work in many good deeds. Dreaming of wearing blue clothes In a dream, then put them in the closet. Details about the end of problems and fears. A dream of wearing yellow clothes is a sign that the fortuneteller will escape harm and harm. A dream of wearing red clothes is an indication of earning money and saving it in times of need. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bag of clothes in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about arranging clothes for a married woman: Dreaming of arranging clothes in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she is taking responsibility and protecting her family and home. If a married woman is seen arranging clothes and then throwing them on the ground, this indicates that there are many problems with the husband. Dreaming of arranging white clothes in a married woman’s dream is a sign of stability in life and doing good. See Also: Interpretation of seeing clothes in a dream. Seeing arranging clothes in a dream for an unmarried woman: Seeing arranging clothes in a single woman’s dream is an indication of her sophistication and love of cleanliness and order. Dreaming of putting together clothes in a single woman’s dream is a sign of approaching marriage. If a single girl sees in a dream herself folding and arranging clothes, This is a sign of the arrival of happy occasions and events. What do folded clothes mean in a dream? Seeing clothes folded and putting them in the closet in a dream is a sign of good life and justice. Dreaming of folding clothes and putting them in someone else’s closet is evidence of sharing secrets with others. Seeing clothes folded and putting them in a closed closet Keep secrets. Dreaming of putting clothes together and then putting them in a travel bag is a sign of a close and happy trip for the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of seeing folded clothes in a dream Arranging clothes on shelves in a closet in a dream: Seeing arranging clothes on closet shelves is a sign of stability and happiness in life. Dreaming of arranging clothes and putting them on closet shelves Clothes are evidence that he heard the good news. What is the interpretation of a dream of a lot of clothes: Lawyers explained that seeing a lot of clothes in a dream is a praiseworthy vision. Dreaming of a lot of clothes in a dream is a sign of food and many good things that will come to the fortuneteller. Seeing a lot of clothes in a dream is a symbol of paying off debts. Dreaming With many clothes in No
